title: Consider the Purpose
text: Actionable insights are meant to guide the audience towards a specific action or decision.

title: Focus on Recommendations
text: The primary goal is to offer clear recommendations based on the data presented.

title: Next Steps
text: Actionable insights often include next steps that the audience can take.

title: Avoiding Redundancy
text: Summarizing the entire presentation is not the main purpose of actionable insights.

title: Relevance of Data
text: Introducing new data not covered in the presentation is not the focus of actionable insights.

title: Conciseness
text: Making the presentation longer is not a reason to include actionable insights.
